meanings.definition: A distinct section of a piece of writing, usually dealing with a single theme and indicated by a new line, indentation, or numbering.
meanings.sent1: In the essay, the author discussed each point in a separate paragraph.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to start a new paragraph when you change topics in your writing.
meanings.sent3: The paragraph about cats was so interesting that I read it twice.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a well-structured paragraph, each part perfectly in its place.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation of a paragraph made it easy to understand.

meanings.definition: To divide a piece of writing into paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: Remember to paragraph your essay to make it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: I always struggle with how to properly paragraph my stories.
meanings.sent3: She likes to paragraph her diary entries with colorful markers.
meanings.sent4: The editor will help you to paragraph your article effectively.
meanings.sent5: Can you teach me how to paragraph my writing like a professional?
